# Model (Overview) {id="model"}

<div class="fragment">

- Governments indexed $i \in \left\{ 1, ..., N \right\}$

</div>
<div class="fragment">

**Sequence**

1. Governments make trade policy announcements
2. Wars
    + Winners impose free trade on vanquished governments
3. ($h(\bm{\tau})$) Economic (general equilibrium, @Eaton2002) consequences of announced/imposed trade policies

</div>
<div class="fragment">

**Payoffs**

$$
V_i \left( h(\bm{\tau}); \color{bcOrange} v_i \color{black} \right)
$$

- $\color{bcOrange} v_i$ - latent preference for protectionist policies

</div>

## ($h(\bm{\tau})$) Economy {id="economy"}

$$
\bm{\tau} = \begin{pmatrix}
\tau_{11} & \cdots & \cdots & \cdots & \tau_{1N} \\
\vdots & \ddots & \vdots & \iddots & \vdots \\
\vdots & \cdots & \tau_{ij} & \cdots & \vdots \\
\vdots & \iddots & \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \\
\tau_{N1} & \cdots & \cdots & \cdots & \tau_{NN}
\end{pmatrix}
$$

## ($h(\bm{\tau})$) Economy

$$
\bm{\tau} = \begin{pmatrix}
\tau_{11} & \cdots & \cdots & \cdots & \tau_{1N} \\
\vdots & \ddots & \vdots & \iddots & \vdots \\
\vdots & \cdots & \color{bcOrange} \tau_{ij} & \cdots & \vdots \\
\vdots & \iddots & \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \\
\tau_{N1} & \cdots & \cdots & \cdots & \tau_{NN}
\end{pmatrix}
$$

<hr style="height:2em; visibility:hidden;" />

- $\color{bcOrange} \tau_{ij}$: trade barrier government $i$ imposes on imports from $j$

## ($h(\bm{\tau})$) Economy

$$
\bm{\tau} = \begin{pmatrix}
\color{bcOrange} \tau_{11} & \color{bcOrange} \cdots & \color{bcOrange} \cdots & \color{bcOrange} \cdots & \color{bcOrange} \tau_{1N} \\

$$

## ($h(\bm{\tau})$) Economy {id="economyEnd"}

$$
\color{bcOrange} \bm{\tau} \color{black} = \begin{pmatrix}
\tau_{11} & \cdots & \cdots & \cdots & \tau_{1N} \\
\vdots & \ddots & \vdots & \iddots & \vdots \\
\vdots & \cdots & \tau_{ij} & \cdots & \vdots \\
\vdots & \iddots & \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \\
\tau_{N1} & \cdots & \cdots & \cdots & \tau_{NN}
\end{pmatrix}
$$

<hr style="height:2em; visibility:hidden;" />

$$
\color{bcOrange} h(\bm{\tau}) \rightarrow \begin{pmatrix}
w_1 \\
\vdots \\
w_N
\end{pmatrix} = \bm{w}
$$

<a href="#/economyA">Economy Details</a>

## Government Objective

$$
h(\bm{\tau}) \rightarrow \begin{pmatrix}
w_1 \\
\vdots \\
w_N
\end{pmatrix} = \color{bcOrange} \bm{w}
$$

<hr style="height:1em; visibility:hidden;" />

- $X_{ij}(\color{bcOrange} \bm{w} \color{black})$: $i$'s imports of goods from $j$

. . . 

**Revenues from Policy Distortions**

$$
r_i(\color{bcOrange} \bm{w} \color{black}; v_i) = \sum_j (\tau_{ij} - v_i) X_{ij}(\color{bcOrange} \bm{w} \color{black})
$$

## Government Objective

$$
h(\bm{\tau}) \rightarrow \begin{pmatrix}
w_1 \\
\vdots \\
w_N
\end{pmatrix} = \bm{w}
$$

<hr style="height:1em; visibility:hidden;" />

- $X_{ij}(\bm{w})$: $i$'s imports of goods from $j$

**Revenues from Policy Distortions**

$$
r_i(\bm{w}; \color{bcOrange} v_i \color{black}) = \sum_{j \neq i} (\tau_{ij} - \color{bcOrange} v_i \color{black}) X_{ij}(\bm{w})
$$

- $\color{bcOrange} v_i \color{black} \in [1, \infty)$ controls $i$'s preferences over the level of protection

. . . 

**Adjusted Consumer Income**

$$
\tilde{Y}_i(h_i(\bm{\tau}))  = w_i L_i + r_i(h(\bm{\tau}); \color{bcOrange} v_i \color{black})
$$

**Indirect Utility**

$$
V_i \left( h(\bm{\tau}); \color{bcOrange} v_i \color{black} \right)
$$
